name: Removal Of Index Value to Hide Schedule Task
description: Detects when the "index" value of a scheduled task is removed or deleted from the registry. Which effectively hides it from any tooling such as "schtasks /query"
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:DeleteKey AND registry.path:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\* AND registry.path:*Index*)`
